name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use?

tags.description: Add tags to the project (used for linting)

directory.description: A directory where the project is placed

isStandaloneConfig.description: should the project use package.json? If false, the project config is inside workspace.json.

projectType.description: This identifies what type of project to create. The values should be the same values as what's passed to the TEMPLATE argument of the dotnet new command

frameworkVersion.description: The .Net Framework version to use. Valid options are either `latest` or `LTS`.

testPrefix.description: An optional prefix to give the tests. Ex: `integration` for `IntegrationTests`
